name: Aerial Guardian
description: Aerial Guardian is a large scale multiplayer battle first person shooter. Choose from several classes and play as a soldier to embroil yourself in a space fleet battle. Choose from a variety of over 20 weapons and several vehicles including mechs. Engage in space dogfights with fighters, or target enemy installations as a bomber, or bring the fight to the enemy with a boarding vessel. Features destructible scenery and weapons that can rebuild them and create defenses. Deploy drones to attack the enemy and repair your ship. Or take command of the entire fleet as the commander and issue orders to your teammates, spawn vehicles, and order tactical laser strikes.
